p: Even though an extensive description of the biological activities of these 13 species of halophytic grasses is available, in most cases, the compound(s) responsible for the medicinal properties as well as the mechanism of action are not known. A lack of information regarding the toxicologic effects of the extracts is evident, which is necessary for the correct use of medicinal plants. In this chapter, the reported biological activities of the extracts from halophytic grasses is described.
